window['closureReadyCallbacks'] = [];
}

function call_when_jsall_loaded(cb) {
if (window['closureReady']) {
cb();
} else {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'].push(cb);
}
}

<script>
var _scriptDownloadCount = 0;
var _retryDownload = function() {
var script = document.createElement('script');
var path = '//d3fw5vlhllyvee.cloudfront.net/s/b321112/jobsearch-all-compiled.js';
script.async = false;
script.src = path;
script.onerror=_onMainJSBundleError;
document.head.appendChild(script);
};
var _onMainJSBundleError = function() {
try {

// for failed downloads, we want to retry the download up to 5 times
if (_scriptDownloadCount < 4) {
_scriptDownloadCount++;
_retryDownload();
return;
}

// if we've exhausted all retries, send a ping to log the failure
var img = document.createElement("img");
var tk = "1g88i3n1mt1d1804"; // tk
img.src = "/rpc/log?a=jasxJsLoadError&tk=" + tk;
document.head.appendChild(img);
document.head.removeChild(img);

} catch(e) {}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
function loadJSAsync( ) {
for ( var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
var url = arguments[i];
(function() {
var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.async = true;
s.src = url;
el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
})();
}
}
</script>

}
function initializeTwoPane() {
var jobKeysWithInfo = {};

}

}

}, function() {

});

}
}
}
};
}

function rclk(el,jobdata,oc,sal) { var ocstr = oc ? '&onclick=1' : ''; document.cookie='RCLK="jk='+jobdata.jk+'&tk=1g88i3n1mt1d1804&from=web&rd='+jobdata.rd+'&qd=7tdTJLF8oc4dPpT7T_zGvOw9pwe0KdS2-VFS_71o5z2XosQX40kabiLZUp-3fJcF0lUj-qY69wlKEPIZAmjPlQIn9cZ2Cv2TCYUpJWE_KPwWMK9SD4D6xi50cciCVtVQ&ts=1658144807990&sal='+sal+ocstr+'"; path=/'; return true;}

function vjrclk(jk, qd, rd, oc, vjk, vjtk, jobsearchTk) {
var ocstr = oc ? '&onclick=1' : '';
var jobsearchTk = jobsearchTk ? jobsearchTk : '';
document.cookie = 'RCLK="jk=' + jk + '&vjtk=' + vjtk + '&jobsearchTk=' + jobsearchTk + '&rd=' + rd + '&qd=' + qd + '&ts=' + new Date().getTime() + ocstr + '"; path=/';
return true;
}

function thirdpartysignin(href, vjk, vjtk, jobsearchTk) {

var doc = new DOMParser().parseFromString(href, "text/html");
var trackingURL = doc.documentElement.textContent;
var trackingImage = new Image();
trackingImage.src = trackingURL + '&vjs=2' + '&tk=' + vjtk + '&jobsearchTk=' + jobsearchTk;
var url = '/thirdpartysignin' + window.location.search + '&jk=' + vjk + '&vjtk=' + vjtk + '&tk=' + vjtk + '&viewtype=embedded';
window.open(url, '_blank', 'noopener');
}

function zrprclk(el,jobdata,oc) { var ocstr = oc ? '&onclick=1' : ''; document.cookie='RCLK="jk='+jobdata.jk+'&tk=1g88i3n1mt1d1804&from=reconzrp&rd='+jobdata.rd+'&qd=7tdTJLF8oc4dPpT7T_zGvOw9pwe0KdS2-VFS_71o5z2XosQX40kabiLZUp-3fJcF0lUj-qY69wlKEPIZAmjPlQIn9cZ2Cv2TCYUpJWE_KPwWMK9SD4D6xi50cciCVtVQ&ts=1658144807990'+ocstr+'"; path=/'; return true;}

<script type="text/javascript">
      function setRefineByCookie(refineByTypes) {
        var expires = new Date();
        expires.setTime(expires.getTime() + (10 * 1000));
        for (var i = 0; i < refineByTypes.length; i++) {
          setCookie(refineByTypes[i], "1", expires);
        }
      }
    </script>

</div>

        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        font-style: italic;
        color: #666666;
    }
</style>

<a id="jobPostingsAnchor" tabindex="-1"></a>


<script type="text/javascript">
            window['onJobCardItemMouseDown'] = function(event, data) {
                if(data['sponsored']) {
                    sjomd(data['id']); clk(data['id']); rclk(this, data['jobdata'], false, data['hasSalary'] ? '1' : '0');
                } else {
                    rclk(this, data['jobdata'], false, data['hasSalary'] ? '1' : '0');
                }
            };
            window['onJobCardItemClick'] = function(event, data) {
                if(data['sponsored']) {
                    setRefineByCookie(data['refineByTypes']); sjoc(data['id'], data['hasSalary'] ? '1' : '0'); convCtr('SJ'); rclk(this, data['jobdata'], true, data['hasSalary'] ? '1' : '0');
                } else {
                    setRefineByCookie(data['refineByTypes']); rclk(this, data['jobdata'], true, data['hasSalary'] ? '1' : '0');
                }
                if (window['2paneEnabled']) {
                    var twoPaneRendered = viewJobOnSerp.onJCSMouseDown2pane(event, data['option'], data['id']);
                    if (twoPaneRendered) {
                        event.preventDefault(); // prevent the default behavior of clicking <a> on JCS
                    }
                    if (data['setFocusToJobDetails']) {
                        var focusTarget = document.querySelector('#vjs-container');
                        if (focusTarget) {
                            focusTarget.focus();
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            window['handleAdditionalLocationLinkMouseDown'] = function(event, data) {
                ptk('addlloc');
            }
            window['handleDislikeClick'] = function(data) {
                // attempt to close 2pane
                window['dislikedJobKey'] = data.jobKey;
                window.dispatchEvent(new Event('dislikeJob'));
            }
        </script>

    </script></div></div><script type="text/javascript">
                try {
                    window.mosaic.onMosaicApiReady(function() {
                        var zoneId = 'jobcards';
                        var providers = window.mosaic.zonedProviders[zoneId];

                        if (providers) {
                            providers.filter(function(p) { return window.mosaic.lazyFns[p]; }).forEach(function(p) {
                                return window.mosaic.api.loadProvider(p);
                            });
                        }
                    });
                 } catch (e) {};

function ptk(st,p) {
document.cookie = 'PTK="tk=1g88i3n1mt1d1804&type=jobsearch&subtype=' + st + (p ? '&' + p : '')
 + (st == 'pagination' ? '&fp=2' : '')
+'"; path=/';
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
function pclk(event) {
var evt = event || window.event;
var target = evt.target || evt.srcElement;
var el = target.nodeType == 1 ? target : target.parentNode;
var tag = el.tagName.toLowerCase();
if (tag == 'span' || tag == 'a') {
ptk('pagination');
}
return true;
}
function addPPUrlParam(obj) {
var pp = obj.getAttribute('data-pp');
var href = obj.getAttribute('href');
if (pp && href) {
obj.setAttribute('href', href + '&pp=' + pp);
}
}
</script>
<nav role="navigation" aria-label="pagination">
<div class="pagination" onmousedown="pclk(event);">
<ul class="pagination-list">

<script type="text/javascript">
var addAlertFormSubmit = function() {
var email = document.getElementById('alertemail').value;
var verified = document.getElementById('alertverified').value;

return addalertdelegate(
'',
'Bern%2C+BE',
'',
email,
'1g88i3n1mt1d1804',
verified,
'CH',
'c494831ad4e9e6750aed95a630c0a8af',
false,
true,
''
);
}

                    window.mosaic.onMosaicApiReady(function() {

<script type="text/javascript">
function showActiveJobAlertLabels() {
if ( !gbid('jobalertswrapper') ) {

return;
}

var label = gbid('jobalerts');
if ( label ) {
label.classList.remove("open");
label.innerHTML = "<div class=\'jobalertlabel\'><div class=\'ja-link\'><a id=\'myalertslink\' aria-label=\'email preferences\' href=\'\/my\/alerts?l=Bern%2C+BE&amp;amp;start=10\' >Job alerts active<\/a><\/div><style type=\'text\/css\'>.ja-link a {text-decoration: underline;}<\/style><\/div>";
}
}

if ( sendRequest ) {
sendRequest( '/rpc/jobalert?a=check&q=&l=Bern%2C+BE&tk=1g88i3n1mt1d1804', 'POST', function( response ) {
if (response.readyState === 4) {
var responseJson = JSON.parse(response.responseText);
if (responseJson['status'] === 'active') {
showActiveJobAlertLabels();
}
}
}
);
}


restore('savedjobs',searchKey,searchState,window.tk,'');
</script>

attachSjBlock('');
attachJaBlock('');
}
if (window['closureReady'] === true) {
jsall_loaded();
}
</script>

                try {
                    window.mosaic.onMosaicApiReady(function() {
                        var zoneId = 'serpBottomBody';
                        var providers = window.mosaic.zonedProviders[zoneId];

                        if (providers) {
                            providers.filter(function(p) { return window.mosaic.lazyFns[p]; }).forEach(function(p) {
                                return window.mosaic.api.loadProvider(p);
                            });
                        }
                    });
